MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH17 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.03pm following reports of third party damage to an underground cable located outside 85 Gilmerton Dykes and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.20pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
